divs: Sighting Details I was out in the pines with my hound, Blue, and we was hunting us some possum when I saws this here light comming real fast through them trees over by chickenfarms and it was like so bright I thuoght it was like a plan gonn crash in. But then i saw it go sideyways reel fast and when it cross my front Blue he started howling like crazy. It movedd fast as buckshot but did no spin no nothing just strait. I like to shoot it but I knews it was no good.onse it got over the chickenfarms I herd lod squawking like you know they going nuts and then this thing it go strait up and was real gone. Man I was so scare and so was Blue he wimpered all the way home and then I told my wife and she sed she saw lights to. We loccked up the trailer and let Blue sleep on the bed and he kept wimper. It weren't no joke.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Hazel Green
There were no other sightings in Hazel Green on or around March 21st 2009
